Name: The Forgettable Dungeon
About the game: Online Co-op Action Roguelike Team up with your friends or go solo to take on the dungeons in this open world top down action roguelike. The world is procedurally generated every time you play, and the items are randomized. Offering a unique experience with each play. Voxel Destruction Everything in the dungeons are made of cubes, and can easily be reduced back to them as well! Watch out for traps and monsters as you delve deeper looking for loot. The dungeons are fully destructible, can't find your way out of a room? Blow a way out with your bombs! Custom characters / skin editor Create your own character with the simple to use in-game voxel editor. You can even re-skin the monsters, items, and textures too! Once you're done making a character set or skin pack, share it on the workshop for all to use. ---- Features: Custom characters Online Multiplayer Local Multiplayer Procedural Dungeons & Randomized items Retro Overworld to explore 3D Guidebook that keeps track of your goals Custom items/monsters/dungeons skins Workshop support for sharing characters/skins Classic Bosses Awesome music by hyperunknown Real time combat inspried by Zelda and beat 'em up games Permadeath Voxel destruction Cooperative gameplay Controller support Framerate, 60/120/144 FPS or unlocked
